dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4044 IH: China Trade Cheating Restitution Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Panetta (for himself, Mr. Valadao, Mr. Costa, and Mr. Smucker) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Trade Facilitation and Trade Enforcement Act of 2015 to modify the description of interest for purposes of certain distributions of antidumping duties and countervailing duties.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the China Trade Cheating Restitution Act of 2023.

section.header: Modification of description of interest for purposes of certain distributions of antidumping duties and countervailing duties
section.text: Section 605(c)(1) of the Trade Facilitation and Trade Enforcement Act of 2015 (19 U.S.C. 4401(c)(1)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking October 1, 2014, by U.S. Customs and Border Protection under, or in connection with— and inserting October 1, 2000, by U.S. Customs and Border Protection..
